fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% load i18n %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ user_name }},

I’m Kelly, the community manager for 350 groups around the world. My job is to help you and your group be as strong, as fun, and as effective as possible.

You’re getting this note because you just created this group: {{ content_object}}.

Since you’re new, let me take a moment explain the basic features of the website:

  • To get started, invite some local friends to join you.
  • You can also check out some group projects right here: http://groups.350.org/projects/.
  • As the group manager, you can moderate discussions, add projects, start campaigns, plan events, and more by using the tools on your group’s page.

One last thing: I’m here to help. If you have a problem, an idea, or a question, just let me know at kelly@350.org.

I’d love to hear your ideas for building a strong climate movement both in your community and around the world.

Onwards,
Kelly Blynn
Community Manager, 350.org

{% endblock %}
fields.name: You've created a community
fields.subject: Making the most of your group.

fields.body:
{{ content_object.user.get_full_name }} has posted a new discussion, {{ content_object.subject }}, on your group’s page.

{{ content_object.subject }}

{{ content_object.body|linebreaks }}

You can reply to this email, or click here to see the whole discussion
fields.name: New Community Discussion
fields.recipient_function: lambda x: [u for u in x.group.users_not_blacklisted() if u.pk != x.user.pk]
fields.subject: New 350 Groups Discussion: {{ content_object.subject }}

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi there,
Someone just requested to join your group, {{ content_object.group }}:
{{ content_object.user.get_full_name }} ({{ content_object.user.email }}) just requested to join.

Click here to accept or deny the request

Remember, {{ content_object.group }} is a closed group. Anyone who wants to join the
group has to get your nod first. To make it open, modify your community settings.

Onwards,
The 350.org team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Community Join Request
fields.subject: Group Join Request

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},
You’re in! The group administrator just approved your access to {{ content_object.group }}.

Click here to go to {{ content_object.group }}

On the group page, you can check out who else is active, what projects your group is working on, and more.

You can browse the list of group projects to check out some other projects to do as a group.

Onwards,
The 350.org Team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Community Membership Approved
fields.subject: Group Membership Response

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},
We're sending you this note because a group administrator turned down your request to join {{ content_object.group }}.

Don’t worry -- there’s lots of other groups to join, or you can start one of your own.

Click here to find more groups
Click here to create your own

Remember, only closed groups need administrator approval. You can join any
of the open groups at anytime.

Good luck,
The 350.org Team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Community Membership Denied
fields.subject: Group Membership Response

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ content_object.first_name }},

{{ author.first_name }} has an update about the event:
{{ note }}

Onwards,
The 350.org Team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Event announcement
fields.subject: Update about {{ content_object.event }} on {{ content_object.event.when|date }}

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ recipient.first_name }},

Thanks for hosting an event on
{{ content_object.when|date }} at {{ content_object.start|time }}.

Your next step is to invite guests. Get started now.

Use your event's page to manage every aspect of
your event. On the event's page, you can:

  • Check the status of your guests
  • Make someone else a co-host
  • Send reminder and announcement emails to your whole guest list

Onwards,
The 350.org Team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Once you create an event
fields.subject: Your event: {{ content_object.event }}

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ recipient.first_name }},

So far, {{ content_object.confirmed_guests.count }} {{ content_object.confirmed_guests.count|pluralize:"person,people" }} have responded to your event invitation, but you're still waiting on
{{ content_object.outstanding_invitations }} other{{ content_object.outstanding_invitations|pluralize}}: {% if content_object.outstanding_invitations %}

    {% for guest in content_object.guests_that_have_not_responded %}
  • {{ guest }}
    • {% endfor %}
{% endif %} You can send these people a friendly reminder. Click here to send them a reminder email.

Some people overlook emails in their inbox. Calling these guests can go a long way. If you've already spoken to them, you can update their RSVP status on your event's page.

Onwards,
The 350.org Team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: 1 week after after you create an event
fields.subject: Guest list update for your event: {{ content_object.event }}

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ content_object.first_name }},

Your event is right around the corner! It's an exciting time,
but don't forget to nail down the final details.

First, send one last reminder to your guests.

Next, make sure to gather any materials you might need for your meeting.

Have a great time at the event -- and good luck!

Onwards,
The 350.org Team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: 48 hours before the event
fields.subject: Your event is less than 2 days away!

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ recipient.first_name }},

We’re sending a quick note to check in and see how your event went.

Just respond to this email to let me know.

You can also take this opportunity to invite your guests to join a local group. That way, you can keep in touch with your guests and plan future projects as a group.

Onwards,
The 350.org team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Day after the event
fields.subject: How'd it go?

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hey {{ recipient.first_name }},

You're all set to attend a local event tomorrow:
Location: {{ content_object.place_name }}
{{ content_object.geom.raw_address }}
({{ content_object.geom.formatted_address }})
Time: {{ content_object.start|time }}
Date: {{ content_object.when|date }}

Onwards,
The 350.org team

{% endblock %}

fields.subject: {{ content_object.creator.first_name }}'s event is tomorrow!

fields.body:

Hey {{ content_object.first_name }},

We’re really excited that you’re coming to {{ content_object.event }}! Mark you calendar now:

Location:
{{ content_object.event.geom.raw_address }}
{{ content_object.event.geom.formatted_address }}
Time:
{{ content_object.event.start|time }}

Here’s what {{ author.first_name }}, the event's host, wants you to know:
{{ note }}

Thanks,
The 350.org team

{% endblock %}

fields.subject: Remember {{ content_object.event }} on {{ content_object.event.when|date }}

fields.body:

Hi {{ content_object.event.creator.get_full_name }}, {{ content_object }} has RSVP’d to {{ content_object.event }} as {{ content_object.get_rsvp_status_display }}.

Cheers,
The 350.org Team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: RSVP notification

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi there,

{{ content_object.user.get_full_name }} ({{ content_object.user.email }}) is building a movement to solve the climate crisis with 350.org, and wants you to join in.

Click here to accept your invitation

By creating an account, you can:

  • Find others in your community to build power and brainstorm.
  • Access easy-to-use tools that will inspire your community to join you.
  • Link up with climate leaders across the country and around the world.
  • Track your community's progress.

{% if note %}

Here's what {{ content_object.user.first_name }} has to say:
{{ note|safe }}

{% endif %}

Get started today!

Sign up at groups.350.org

Cheers,
The 350.org team

{% endblock %}

Hi,

{% endif %}

{{ content_object.content_object }} is a group on 350.org. 350 Groups help people get organized, connect with friends, and do projects together to transform their communities and help fight the climate crisis.
Link up today:

Join now

Cheers,
The 350.org Team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Community invite
fields.subject: Invitation from {{ content_object.user.get_full_name }} to join a group

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Welcome {{ content_object.first_name }}!

Congratulations on your new account on 350.org.

On 350.org, people like you are getting together to take on projects, transform their communities, and build a movement to solve the climate crisis.

Can’t wait to get started? Click here to log in.

With so much to do, where should you begin? Here are some bright ideas:

  • Get plugged in to your local movement by finding a local group to join.
  • Are you the first person to join in in your community? Start a local group and then organize your community to take action together.

As you cruise around the site, let us know what you think by dropping us a line at feedback@350.org.

Thanks -- and we’ll be in touch!

Onwards,
The 350.org Team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Registration
fields.subject: Your brand new account

fields.name: New Account
fields.subject: New 350 Groups User: {{ content_object.email }}

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ recipient.first_name }},

I’m Kelly, the community manager for 350 groups around the world. My job is to help you and your group be as strong, as fun, and as effective as possible.

You’re getting this note because you just put this group on the map: {{ content_object}}

Your group’s pin on the map will link out to your external action website.

If you ever want to change your group listing to use the features on groups.350.org (like launching group projects, organizing events, and launching local campaigns) you can do it easily whenever you’d like. Just let us know!

Onwards,

Kelly Blynn for the 350.org Team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Thanks for listing your group
fields.subject: Thanks for listing your group!
